definition: lit. laughs, jeers, anger and invective (idiom)/fig. all kinds of emotions/to mock and scold/(of writing) freely roving/following the author's fancy

sentences.english: The sixth chapter "the Yuan Can Article States Discusses": Analyzes Yuan Can's write Style and doctrine attainments in Buddhist.
sentences.chinese: 分析袁粲嬉笑怒罵的文風及其在佛法中的造詣。

definition: hard to tell if it's real or sham
to pretend that everything is going well
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
variant of 矇騙|蒙骗[meng1 pian4]
lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end

definition: (of an uneducated person) to mingle with the cognoscenti/to pose as a culture lover/to be a culture snob/having pretensions to culture
